links.title: Apple reports earnings in a hectic week for markets, with a Fed meeting and jobs report also on tap
links.description: Michael Nagle | Bloomberg | Getty Images Tech bellwether Apple leads the earnings parade in the week ahead, as market focus also shifts to the Fed's mid-week meeting and Friday's jobs report. About a quarter of S&P 500 companies report in what will be the last big week for second-quarter earnings.

links.title: July 28, 2018 - Weekend Market Comment
links.description: July 28, 2018 - Stocks fell on the last days of this week as a rollover in technology shares led by Facebook, Netflix, Intel and Twitter offset strong economic data. Tech stocks had their second straight day of steep losses. On Thursday, the sector dropped more than 1.5 percent as Facebook posted its worst day ever.
